choiceMode.description: Indicates the choices are single or multiple selection
choiceMode.title: choiceMode

choicePrefix.description: What key should be displayed before choices. If undefined no  key will be displayed.
choicePrefix.title: choicePrefix

choices.description: The choice options for the question

correct.description: Indicates if the choice is correct
correct.title: correct

value.description: the value that will be stored if this choice is selected
value.title: value

label.description: the text label that will be presented to the user for this choice
label.title: label

feedback.description:
The type of feedback to use:
   `default` = a standard feedback message
   `custom` = a customized feedback message
feedback.title: Feedback

choices.title: choices

prompt.description: The question prompt or item stem
prompt.title: prompt

choicesLayout.description: Indicates the layout of choices for player
choicesLayout.title: choicesLayout

gridColumns.description: Indicates the number of columns for the grid layout
gridColumns.title: gridColumns

toolbarEditorPosition.description: Indicates the editor's toolbar position which can be 'bottom' or 'top'
toolbarEditorPosition.title: toolbarEditorPosition

selectedAnswerBackgroundColor.description: Indicates the background color for selected choices
selectedAnswerBackgroundColor.title: selectedAnswerBackgroundColor

selectedAnswerStrokeColor.description: Indicates the border color for selected choices
selectedAnswerStrokeColor.title: selectedAnswerStrokeColor

selectedAnswerStrokeWidth.description: Indicates the border width for selected choices if selectedAnswerBackgroundColor is set
selectedAnswerStrokeWidth.title: selectedAnswerStrokeWidth

hoverAnswerBackgroundColor.description: Indicates the background color for choices on hover
hoverAnswerBackgroundColor.title: hoverAnswerBackgroundColor

hoverAnswerStrokeColor.description: Indicates the border color for choices on hover
hoverAnswerStrokeColor.title: hoverAnswerStrokeColor

hoverAnswerStrokeWidth.description: Indicates the border width for choices on hover if hoverAnswerBackgroundColor is set
hoverAnswerStrokeWidth.title: hoverAnswerStrokeWidth

lockChoiceOrder.description:
Indicates the order of choices presented to user
if true, answer choices will be presented in the order they are defined in the model
If false, answer choices may be presented in a random order (depending upon the value of the lockChoiceOrder environment variable)
lockChoiceOrder.title: lockChoiceOrder

minSelections.description: Indicates that minimum selections that should be made (only for choice mode 'checkbox')
minSelections.title: minSelections

maxSelections.description: Indicates that maximum selections that should be made (only for choice mode 'checkbox')
maxSelections.title: maxSelections

partialScoring.description: Indicates that the item should use partial scoring
partialScoring.title: partialScoring

spellCheckEnabled.description: Indicates if spellcheck is enabled for the author. Default value is true
spellCheckEnabled.title: spellCheckEnabled

studentInstructionsEnabled.description: Indicates if Student Instructions are enabled
studentInstructionsEnabled.title: studentInstructionsEnabled

teacherInstructionsEnabled.description: Indicates if Teacher Instructions are enabled
teacherInstructionsEnabled.title: teacherInstructionsEnabled

accessibilityLabelsEnabled.description: Indicates if Accessibility Labels are enabled
accessibilityLabelsEnabled.title: accessibilityLabelsEnabled

language.description:
Indicates the language of the component
Supported options: en, es, en_US, en-US, es_ES, es-ES, es_MX, es-MX
language.title: language

isSelectionButtonBelow.description: Indicates if the selection button and choice prefix should be positioned below the corresponding answer choice
isSelectionButtonBelow.title: isSelectionButtonBelow

autoplayAudioEnabled.description: Indicates if the audio for the prompt should autoplay
autoplayAudioEnabled.title: autoplayAudioEnabled

completeAudioEnabled.description: Indicates if the audio should reach the end before the item can be marked as 'complete'
completeAudioEnabled.title: completeAudioEnabled

customAudioButton.description:
Indicates if the audio should be replaced with a custom audio button
  playImage: image url for the play state
  pauseImage: image url for the pause state
customAudioButton.title: customAudioButton

id.description: Identifier to identify the Pie Element in html markup, Must be unique within a pie item config.
id.title: id

settings.description: Indicates if the item has to be displayed in the Settings Panel
settings.title: settings

label.description: Indicates the label for the item that has to be displayed in the Settings Panel
label.title: label

disabled.description: Indicates if the plugin is disabled or not
disabled.title: disabled

disabled.description: Indicates if the plugin is disabled or not
disabled.title: disabled

disabled.description: Indicates if the plugin is disabled or not
disabled.title: disabled

disabled.description: Indicates if the plugin is disabled or not
disabled.title: disabled

customPlugins.description:
An array of objects that determine custom plugins.
A custom plugin is an object which determines how the button will look like (icon) and the event name that will be triggered when button gets pressed (event).
Example can be found at https://github.com/pie-framework/pie-lib/blob/develop/packages/demo/pages/editable-html.js#L425.

event.description:
The name of the custom event. It needs to be valid (only letters, numbers and "_" can be used).
PIE will emit the event prefixed with "PIE-".
Eg: event = 'client_custom_event_A' => the emitted event will be "PIE-client_custom_event_A"
event.title: event

iconAlt.description: The alt for the custom button icon
iconAlt.title: iconAlt

iconType.description:
The icon type.
Currently, only "SVG" is supported.
iconType.title: iconType

icon.description: The icon string. Currently, only "SVG" is supported, so it needs to be a valid svg.
icon.title: icon

customPlugins.title: customPlugins

enabled.description:
Indicates the value of the item if it affects config-ui

rationale.description: Indicates the max dimension for images in rationale
rationale.title: rationale

choices.description: Indicates the max dimension for images in choices
choices.title: choices

mmlOutput.description: Indicates if model should have mathML output instead of latex
